alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 7:49AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY, APRIL 21... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam releases * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST Friday Apr 21. * IMPACTS...lowland flooding along the Gila River downstream of the Salt River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 749 AM MST, increased water flow along the Gila River due to upstream dam releases on the Salt River will likely result in flooding of unbridged river crossings and may inundate some farm fields between Avondale and Painted Rock Dam. - Some locations adjacent to the Gila River that will experience flooding include... Goodyear, Buckeye, Gila Bend, Painted Rock Dam, Cotton Center, Palo Verde, Liberty and Arlington. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not attempt to walk through flood water. Stay away or get swept away!
